phrases: I will ask once more.
Why did you call me by the name of the Jealous Witch?
Because you told me to.
I do not know who told you that,
but they have terrible taste!
The Jealous Witch is the epitome of taboo,
and you call me by her name, which most dare not even say!
That is right!
That is going too far, boy!
If you have nothing to say, I am leaving.
I have things to do.
Felt!
Were you stalling me?
Are you working with her?!
N-No!
Hey... W-Wait a minute!
You have it all wrong!
I am...
Damn it!
Could someone just treat me a little nicer?
Why was I even...
summoned to this world?
What are you babbling about?
If you do not want to get hurt, cough up whatever you have got!
Would you stop it already?!
No one is this damn persistent!
You think you can mouth off to us?
You are in my way!
I have somewhere I have to go!
Man, now you have done it.
You stabbed him?
You have got to be kidding me...
It hurts...
It hurts...
N-No!
He walked right into my blade!
What are you doing?
Well, no sense in wasting it.
Take anything on him that is worth selling!
Huh?
Whoa, wait!
The guards will be here any second!
But Old Man Rom ate those.
How?
C-Could... this be...
Run!
We are in trouble!
Well, boy?
You want this appa?
Hey, mister...
Huh?
How many times have you seen me now?
What do you mean?
I have never seen you before.
Well?
Are you buying it or not?
Sorry, but I am broke beyond compare!
Get the hell outta here!
Wallet, cell phone, corn potage snack, cup noodles.
My tracksuit and sneakers are intact, too.
And naturally...
Thank god.
A wound to the back is a warrior's greatest shame.
Well, with so much circumstantial evidence, there is no denying it.
It is kind of hard to believe, but this has to be...
A time leap.
And each time, I return to my initial state.
I will call it
Return by Death.
I actually get a time-leap ability, and it only activates when I die.
The precondition being pitiful is so typical.
If I have gone back in time, Satella has not helped me in this fourth life.
Meaning the debt I owed her for saving me is gone.
In that case, I should forget everything, sell this,
save some funds, and use my knowledge of the modern world to live in luxury!
My dream is taking shape before my eyes!
Right, mister?
Wh-Why are you asking me?
I have no idea what you are talking about.
Aw, that is cold...
I do not want to get caught up in other people's problems.
Do not talk to me.
Well, I guess Let sleeping dogs lie, applies in any world.
But still, there are always softies
who help others, even when they really cannot afford to...
She would just had something precious stolen.
She did not have time for me.
Yet she saved some useless stranger,
and even healed him.
Then she let that useless stranger be pleased with himself...
Even if Satella does not know me,
Felt still stole her insignia.
And Elsa will...
No matter how many times I repeat this, that will not change.
They say history repeats itself, right?
Yeah.
If I have knowledge that people I used to know will be killed,
I cannot just ignore it!
Hey, mister...
What do you want, broke kid?
There is something I want to ask you...
Have there been any pickpocketing incidents around here?
Asking questions, without buying anything?
You really do have guts.
Incidents like that are not uncommon at all.
Though, that last one was unusual...
They threw some magic around in the street a few times.
Things that looked like icicles flew around and lodged in the wall.
But they disappeared fast.
I am too late?
I thought if I could keep the insignia from being stolen, then maybe...
Maybe what?
Oh, just talking to myself, but...
Thanks, mister...
For telling me, even though I did not buy anything.
It is no big deal.
A broke kid, like you, just helped my daughter after she got lost earlier.
I guess fate is a compelling force, too...
What are you smiling about?
Nothing.
I will buy an appa next time!
Sure.
Buy one, and you will be a customer.
Get to work, broke kid!
Right!
This means there is only one way.
Before Elsa comes to the loot house,
I have to buy the insignia from Felt, and return it to Satella!
Wait...
Satella was just an alias, was not it?
Then I have got to get her to tell me her real name this time
What are you babbling about?
If you do not want to get hurt, cough up whatever you have got!
I am getting sick of seeing your faces, Larry, Moe, and Curly.
After doing this four times, I have learned my lesson!
Guards!
What the hell, you bastard?!
My memory from before was right.
This world does have some kind of police force!
Someone!
P-Please, I need a man!
Damn it, shut up!
No, do not touch me...
Stop.
I cannot hear you.
You are not being sincere enough.
Police...
Huh?
Do not scare me like that.
I might have freaked out, just a little.
Just a little bit.
Just a tiny, little bit.
Trying to run will not help you.
That is enough.
Red hair.
And a knight's sword, with scratches made by dragon claws.
It cannot be.
Reinhard?
The master swordsman, Reinhard?
Seems I need not introduce myself.
Although, that nickname is a bit much.
I do not know how much my modest strength could aid him.
But if you wish to resort to extreme measures,
as a knight, I would have to fight back.
S-Screw this!
It is not worth it!
I am glad we are both safe.
Are you unhurt?
A-Allow me to thank you, from the bottom of my heart, for saving my life!
I, Natsuki Subaru, deeply admire your selflessness!
No need for such formality.
Once it was three against two, they lost their advantage.
If I would been alone, it would have been different.
H-His nice-guy index is off the charts.
Uh... Reinhard-san, right?
You may just call me Reinhard, Subaru.
He closed our distance like it was nothing...
Well, thanks again, Reinhard.
You are the only one who heard me shouting and came to help...
Talk about lonely.
For most, it is too risky to face off against people like them.
As far as it goes, you were right to call for the guards.
Are you a guard?
You do not look like one...
I am off duty today, so I am not in uniform.
And I realize that I do not appear particularly intimidating.
Come to think of it, did not they call you a master swordsman?
My family is fairly unique.
Every day, I feel I will be crushed by their expectations.
Anyway, Subaru...
You have quite the unusual hair, apparel, and name.
What nation are you from?
At the moment, Lugunica is a bit more restive than in peacetime.
If you have a problem, I would be glad to help you.
Would you come to the loot house?
The loot house?
N-Never mind...
Forget it.
I cannot trouble you with that...
I will handle the rest on my own, somehow.
But...
I would appreciate it if you could deliver a message.
I would be glad to, of course.
To whom?
And what?
Well, I do not know her name, but...
Have you seen a girl with white robes and silver hair nearby?
White robes and silver hair?
She is also extremely gorgeous!
No, I have not.
Then, if you do see her,
tell her not to go near the loot house, no matter what.
I will find what she is looking for and bring it to her myself.
Very well.
If I see her, I shall relay your message.
Thanks.
I will repay you one day!
All right.
Take care.
Felt's den?
Yeah, just go two streets down that way.
Thanks, I appreciate it, bro.
Do not mention it, bro.
Live strong.
The question is whether Felt will return there...
I would rather catch her before she goes to the loot house,
and trade her the cell phone for the insignia
Whoa!
Oh, dear!
I am sorry.
Are you all right?
Yeah, I am fine.
I do not look it, but toughness is one thing I... have...
What is wrong?
You do not have to be so scared.
I will not do anything to you.
What gave you that idea?
Your scent.
When people are scared, I can smell their fear.
Right now, you are frightened.
You are also angry, are not you?
At me.
It is fine.
I am a little curious, but this is not the time to start a commotion.
That is not a very nice thing to say...
If you are too scary, that beauty will go to waste
Oh, very good.
Conceal your hostility, and you will be even better.
Well, I will be going now.
Something tells me we will meet again.
Someone actually lives here?
Elsa has not already been here and trashed it, has she?
I-It is fine, I am sure...
I do not smell blood.
But it does smell like garbage.
What do you think you are doing, peeking into someone is house?
Sorry, but there is nothing worth stealing in there.
Beat it!
No, wait!
That is not what I was doing...
Shut up!
Do not argue!
Whoa, stop...
Calm down!
This is no time to fight!
Before it gets dark
Before it gets dark, you would better be gone.
I told you, you have got it all wrong...
You do not give up, do you?
I told you to get out of here!
Just listen to me!
P-Please!
Just hear me out, Felt!
I came to see you on important business!
How do you know my name?
You want me to steal something for you?
You should have said that first!
You are the one who attacked me right away.
You know, this is a greedy business you are running!
Do you pride yourself on sticky fingers?
It is all a matter of how to stay alive.
If it were not this, I would have no choice but to sell my body.
So, what is your business with me?
Spit it out.
There is one thing I want.
Here and now, I want to buy the insignia you stole!
You are not associated with my client.
Are you a business rival?
Call her a rival, or call her the one who killed my parents...
Or even the one who killed me!
You make no sense.
Well, I am only interested in selling to whoever pays most.
If you have got an offer that might be profitable, I will listen.
Very shrewd...
I have something worth more than twenty holy coins.
I want to buy your insignia with it.
It is what everyone wants these days, a metia.
That is the power of a metia!
It is a one-of-a-kind item that can capture and stop a moment in time.
So, how about it?
You do not seem to be lying.
But that is supposed to be me?
I am way prettier.
If you look this good without makeup, you are doing fine...
Do not complain.
Well, it is unusual.
I will give you that.
But twenty holy coins?
Not likely.
I am not so stupid as to believe, without question,
everything a prospective buyer says.
Well, of course not.
At the far edge of the slums is a loot house.
The fair thing is to have the codger who lives there, Old Man Rom, appraise it.
So it still comes to that...
Okay, got it.
Let us go.
Right now...
Let us move.
On the double!
We will have him take a look, and get right out of there!
Hey, hey!
What is your problem?
Why are you in such a hurry?
You are soaked with sweat.
Live strong.
Everyone in the slums says that.
Is it some kind of slogan?
Do not lump me in with those guys!
They are all talk.
They are not strong at all.
They are just a bunch of stingy losers at life.
That is a bit harsh...
I am not like the people here.
I have no intention of living out my life in these back alleys!
And you think twenty holy coins will make your dream come true?
It is true that it would be a huge leap toward my goal.
Even if I were alone, it is not as if I could not get by with effort.
If you were alone?
Never mind...
What are you smirking about?
You really piss me off!
Do not worry about it.
H-Hey, what are you doing?
Stop!
Hey!
Just got to make it work, huh?
I said, Stop!
And only I can do that.
Do not get all sentimental and babble nonsense!
I will bite you!
It is not only for her.
I will change the fate that is waiting for me.
And to do that, I will...
I told you to cut it out!
So this is a metia...
Even I have never seen one before.
It is fairly delicate, so handle it with care.
Think along the lines of, If you break it, you have to die,
like no do-overs.
Yeah, I am definitely impressed.
If I were to sell this, I would take no less than fifteen... no, twenty holy coins.
It is worth at least that.
All right!
Negotiations complete!
Now, if we are done talking, let us go for drinks to celebrate a completed sale!
Hold it!
Why are you in such a hurry?
Life does not last forever.
Make every second count.
Do not waste any
Yeah, yeah!
I do not care about all that.
Why do you even want the insignia, anyway?
This insignia is worth a lot more than it looks.
That is why everyone wants it.
In other words, this would sell for more than a metia
Hang on, Felt!
That is a dangerous way to think!
He appraised it at over twenty holy coins.
Just sell it for that!
Do not ask for more!
El The woman who asked you for it cannot go higher than twenty, either.
She will not pay more than that!
How do you know that?
You just admitted that you are with them.
I do not have time...
Please, Felt!
Begging will not help.
I acknowledge you as a negotiating party.
But not hearing what my client says would not be fair.
The reason I want that insignia
is so I can return it to its owner.
Huh?
I want to return it to its owner!
That is why I want the insignia!
That is all!
So please!
Felt, it does not look to me like the boy's lying.
Do not get taken in by him.
He is obviously joking around.
Return it to the owner?
Ridiculous!
If you are going to lie, make it believable!
I will not be fooled!
Felt...
Who is that?
It might be for me.
It is a little early, though.
Do not open it!
W-We will be killed!
Kill you?
I would not do something so terrifying.
Reunion with the Witch
